import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; import { checkMax, checkMin } from "./TimerChecks"; function Pomodoro() { // Timer starts out paused //Arrays for Focus and Break timers const initialFocus = Array.from(Array(60).keys())[25] const initialBreak = Array.from(Array(15).keys())[5] //Click handlers const increaseFocusClick = () => { setFocusTimer((currentTime) => currentTime+checkMax(currentTime, focusMax)) } //State object variable const initialSessionState = { focusTimer: 25, breakTimer: 5, } const [sessionStates, setSessionStates] = useState({...initialSessionState}) const [isTimerRunning, setIsTimerRunning] = useState(false); const [focusTimer, setFocusTimer] = useState(25); const [focusMax, setFocusMax] = useState(60); const [focusMin, setFocusMin] = useState(5); useInterval( () => { // ToDo: Implement what should happen when the timer is running }, isTimerRunning ? 1000 : null ); function playPause() { setIsTimerRunning((prevState) => !prevState); } return (
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: {focusTimer}:00
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current break session duration */} Break Duration: 05:00
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/} {/* TODO: Implement increasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/}
{/* TODO: Implement stopping the current focus or break session and disable when there is no active session */}
{/* TODO: This area should show only when a focus or break session is running or pauses */}
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) and total duration */}

Focusing for 25:00 minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below to include time remaining in the current session */}

25:00 remaining

); } export default Pomodoro;
